scripts.dev:client: cross-env VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS=${VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS:-local} NODE_ENV=development VITE_API_URL=${VITE_API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite src/client --root src/client --port 3000 --config src/client/vite.config.js --open
scripts.dev:dashboard: cross-env VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS=${VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS:-local} NODE_ENV=development VITE_API_URL=${VITE_API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite src/dashboard --root src/dashboard --port 4200 --config src/dashboard/vite.config.js --open
scripts.build:client: cross-env VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS=${VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS:-production} NODE_ENV=production VITE_API_URL=${VITE_API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite build src/client --root src/client --config src/client/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
scripts.build:dashboard: cross-env VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS=${VITE_BUILD_VARIANTS:-production} NODE_ENV=production VITE_API_URL=${VITE_API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite build src/dashboard --root src/dashboard --config src/dashboard/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
scripts.analyse:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=production analyse=true vite build src/client --root src/client --config src/client/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
scripts.analyse:dashboard: cross-env NODE_ENV=production analyse=true vite build src/dashboard --root src/dashboard --config src/dashboard/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
